results.definition: the arrangement of the body and its limbs
examples: he assumed an attitude of surrender

results.definition: a complex mental state involving beliefs and feelings and values and dispositions to act in certain ways
examples: he had the attitude that work was fun

results.definition: a theatrical pose created for effect
examples: the actor struck just the right attitude

results.definition: position of aircraft or spacecraft relative to a frame of reference (the horizon or direction of motion)
